summary: A command‑line utility that finalises a software release by promoting Snap packages built in Azure Pipelines from the beta channel to the stable channel, handling version extraction, revision lookup and artifact publishing via the Snapcraft CLI and Azure DevOps APIs.
business_intent: Automate the post‑release steps required to make newly built Snap artifacts publicly available on the stable channel, reducing manual effort, ensuring consistency, and integrating with the CI/CD pipeline.
